thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Yunnan Nantian Electronics Information to subscribe 3.3 mln shares of Yunnan-based tech firm for 31 mln yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Yunnan Nantian Electronics Information to subscribe 3.3 mln shares of Yunnan-based tech firm for 31 mln yuan

organizations.name: reuters) - yunnan nantian electronics information co ltd

text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Yunnan Nantian Electronics Information Co Ltd
* Says it will subscribe 3.3 million shares of Yunnan-based tech firm for 31 million yuan via private placement and raise stake in the tech firm to 33.7 percent
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/1Mf6ug
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
